title: Home Tab - Team Snapshot - Team in the Series
custom_preconds:
Tester has their test device set up in Spanish Language.
Tester has configured their app to be connected to the QA environment.
There is a Post Season Game that is about to be strung.
Tester is logged in with a test userid.
Tester has favorite team set to one of the teams about to play in the Post Season Game.
custom_steps:
1.  While the game is each of these 3 states:  (Preview, In Progress, Final) - check that this state is indicated in Spanish.
2.  Check that the day of the week for the selected game is indicated in Spanish
2.  Check that the links (Gameday, Tickets, Story are in Spanish.
3.  Check that the tab names (Home, Scores, Watch, Standings, News) are in Spanish.
4.  Scroll down and check that articles, My Highlights, My Players, My News, Popular, Standings, and other articles are in Spanish.
5.  Check that additional links such as Full Standings, See More, and Edit are in Spanish.
custom_expected: Team Names, Player Names, and Calendar information will not be in Spanish.  Advertisements may or may not be in Spanish.

title: Provider Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the TV Network schedules are released
custom_steps: WHEN the user tests playback on all TV Provider streams
custom_expected:
THEN the user can confirm successful playback from:
1. ESPN
2. ABC
3. FOX
4. TBS
5. ESPN2

title: Executive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user is logged into their executive account
AND the executive account has full MLB.tv access
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches a live postseason game
AND the game is National or International
custom_expected:
THEN the executive credentials do not have blackouts
AND the executive credentials do not have MVPD flows
AND the executive credentials do not have paywalls

title: International MLBALL Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as an INT user 
AND the INT account has an MLBALL subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches an INT postseason feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: International Single-Team  Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an INT-ST Account
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches an international feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Audio-Only Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an account with MLB Audio credentials
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the audio EPG button (headphones)
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to listen to audio streams or audio-only

title: Provider Archive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user has linked their account to a TV Provider
custom_steps: WHEN a game has gone final and archived
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive instant playback

title: Non-MVPD Archive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user does not have a TV provider linked to their account
custom_steps:
WHEN the postseason stream goes final
AND 90 minutes has passed
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive archive playback without having to have an MVPD sign-in linked

title: Free User Access (Not Entitled)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged into an account
AND the user is not logged into a TV Provider
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch a game
custom_expected: THEN the user will get a non-entitled error message

title: Single Team Users and Audio Streams
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is signed into a Single-Team account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the Audio EPG Menu
AND the user taps on an audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to listen to game audio

title: MLB Audio Only Subscriptions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user's account has audio-only entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch a game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a non-entitled message
OR the user will be dlinked into the Audio EPG menu

title: Archive MVPD Auth Removal After 90 Minutes
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not linked to an MVPD TV Provider
custom_steps:
WHEN the live game enters archived state
AND the archive has been available for 90+ minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive playback immediately
AND the user will not need to sign into TV Provider

title: Archive Canadian Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is located in Canada
AND a game has entered a completed archive state
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the archive after 90 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive playback
AND the Canadian user will no longer be blacked out

title: INT Feed Blackouts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is located in the United States
AND the user has an MLBAll subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch the INT feed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a blackout message
AND the user will only be able to launch US feed

title: Single Team Users and MVPD
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is signed into a Single-Team account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to launch a US feed
AND the user signs into their cable provider
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive US feed playback

title: Anon MLBALL Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has purchased an MLB.tv subscription through Apple Store

AND the user does not link the purchase to an MLB account
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a US Feed in the feed picker
custom_expected: THEN the user must sign into a cable TV provider in order to receive playback of the US feed

title: Correct Logo In Auth Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a US feed
AND the app prompts the user to link a tv provider
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the MVPD flow
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct postseason logo

title: Successful Launch After MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a US feed
AND the app prompts the user to link a tv provider
custom_steps:
WHEN the user signs into their cable provider
AND then navigated back to the MLB app launch point
custom_expected: THEN the feed will begin playback

title: MLBALL Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into an account
AND the user has an MLBALL entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the US feed option
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive a prompt for the MVPD flow

title: MVPD Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing the hero image on Watch tab

AND the user is not entitled to an account with a TV Provider connected
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the various pills that may be displayed on the hero image
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the MVPD pill indicating that the user will have to sign into their cable provider

title: Games With Auth
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game with an MVPD auth requirement
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero image text
custom_expected: THEN you may verify the Auth text displayed: “Authentication to a participating pay TV provider is required to view select Postseason games in the U.S.. To authenticate, visit mlb.tv/postseason”

title: Games With Auth (Spanish)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game with MVPD auth requirements
custom_steps: WHEN verifying the hero auth copy
custom_expected:
THEN you may verify the hero messaging in Spanish: 

"Games With Auth: “Autenticación de un proveedor de televisión por pago se requiere para ver juegos selectos de Postemporada en EE.UU. Para autenticar, visita mlb.tv/postseason"

title: Games Without Auth For Canadian Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game without MVPD requirements

AND the user is located in Canada
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero copy
custom_expected:
THEN user may verify messaging for Games w/out auth: 

“Live game video of this Postseason game is not available in Canada. Live audio is available for every Postseason game.”

title: Games Without Auth For Candian Users (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game without MVPD requirements

AND the user is located in Canada
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero message for the game
custom_expected:
THEN user may verify spanish hero messaging of: 

"El video del juego en vivo de este juego de postemporada no está disponible en Canadá. El audio en vivo está disponible para cada juego de postemporada."

title: Confirm FLive In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features Free Live content (World Series Parade)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the FLive content
custom_expected: THEN successful playback will begin

title: Confirm SLive In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features Subscription Live content (Bettor's Eye)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the SLive content
custom_expected: THEN successful playback of SLive stream is confirmed

title: Confirm VOD In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features VOD content (Fastcast)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches VOD content from hero
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Confirm SVOD in Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features SVOD content (MLB Featured Section's Inside Stitch)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches SVOD content from hero
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Watch Live Button For SLive/FLive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features FLive or SLive content
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero image and copy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a Watch Live button displayed

title: Games Carousel On Home/Watch Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is only one game scheduled for the current day

AND the game is not in a live state yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games carousel area under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the game that is not live yet will be featured under Games

AND FLive, SLive, VOD, or SVOD content will be in the hero

title: Games Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Games page on a date where there is only one game featured
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game page in the Watch segment
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the featured game tile displayed

title: No Games Carousel On Home/Watch Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Home/Watch page on a date where there are no games being displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls up and down through the page
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any games carousel available for the user, including a header

title: Banner Ad
custom_preconds:
- Given user is non-entitled 
- Given a user have selected a Team Page
custom_steps: When a Team Page is loaded
custom_expected: Then the banner ad at the bottom of the screen should appear

title: Game Start
custom_preconds:
* User is logged in and has notifications turned on
* User has favorite team Game Start toggled to on
custom_steps:
Given user's favorite team is about to start a game
When the game starts
custom_expected: Then the user should receive a "game start" notification

title: Lead Change
custom_preconds:
* User is logged in and has notifications turned on
* User has favorite team and Lead Change notification is toggled to on
custom_steps:
Given the user's followed team is playing a game
And a lead change occurs within the game
custom_expected: Then the user should receive a Lead Change notification

title: Game End
custom_preconds:
* User is logged in and has notifications turned on
* User has favorite team Game End toggled to on
custom_steps:
Given user's favorite team is playing a game and is about to end
When the game ends
custom_expected: Then the user should receive a "game end" notification

title: Standings
custom_preconds:
Paid - http://m.mlb.com/atbat/iphone/standings/?view=divisional

Lite - http://m.mlb.com/atbat/iphone/standings/?view=divisional&lite=true

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on Standings from either bottom menu or the More menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Standings page opens

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user switches between the Divisional & Wild Card tabs
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the records and standings appear to be up to date & accurate

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has the application in the background on the Settings page and returns to the application
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Standings updates immediately

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Standings and a team has clinched a playoff spot
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the playoff legend of (w, x y and z) will appear at the bottom of standings for both Divisional & Wild Card tabs

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Wild Card tab and their is a tie in the standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the tied teams will display in the Divisional Leaders & Wild Card sections

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Wild Card tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the division leaders have the corresponding division letter to the left of their name (E, C, or W)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has a favorite team selected and is on the Divisional tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the favorite team appears highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has a favorite team selected and it is on the Divisional tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the division of the favorite team is on top

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has a favorite team selected and it is on the Wild Card tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the league sorted to the top is that of the favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on an iPad and the settings are in Regular Season Mode, when the Last Game and Next Game values are displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the game and result information they display are accurate

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on an iPad Standings and taps Deep Link under Last Game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the Gameday (Wrap) view of that game

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on an iPad Standings and taps Deep Link under Next Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the Gameday view (Preview, PBP) of that game

Repeat for Game in Preview state and Game in Live state

title: Enable/Disable all
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on notifications page
AND taps on favorite team
THEN ENABLE/DISABLE ALL button should be displayed
WHEN user taps on that button
THEN all toggles should enable/disable but the live activities

title: Mid inning state
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is between innings

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN hide count & base path details and display “Mid [Inning Number]”

title: Team At Bat Indicator
custom_steps:
GIVEN a live activity is not between inning (but rather in the middle of a live inning)

WHEN displaying the data on the platter

THEN add an indicator to the team that is at bat

title: Mid inning in play
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is in play

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN display [bot/top][inning]
AND bases, count, and outs
AND at bat indicator pointing to the team that is currently at bat
AND pitcher and player at bat

title: Live activities toggle
custom_preconds: User has a favorite team set in account settings
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on scores page

AND favorite team is about to play in the next 2 hours

WHEN user enables the track action item

AND refreshes the page

THEN the button should stay enabled

title: Live Activities - Probable pitchers
custom_steps:
GIVEN a game is not in the Live or Final state / the game has not started yet

WHEN there are game state changes (e.g. pregame > warmup)

THEN do not display the game state change

AND just display the starting Pitcher last name for both team’s until the game starts and there is P/AB information to display

title: Game Transitions from Scheduled to Delayed or Postponed
custom_steps:
GIVEN a Live Activity is already on a users lockscreen

WHEN that game transitions from a scheduled state to a delayed state or postponed state

THEN we will display the updated game status on the platter of the Live Activity per the design

title: Display Starting Pitchers In Delayed State
custom_steps:
GIVEN a Live Activity has entered the delayed state

WHEN populating the chin of the live activity

THEN display the starting pitchers for both teams (as we do in a scheduled or warmup state)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is SCHEDULED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410447)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410448)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game starts (when we receive a first update, should happen after the warm-up but before the first throw)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to live

title: LA Lock Screen - game is LIVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is live

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* light Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410451)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:

game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status

title: Live Activities -> Pitcher Change
custom_preconds:
* User has application installed
* User has notifications enabled
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user's followed or favorite team is playing
AND user has live activities enabled for that game
WHEN a pitcher is changed in that game
THEN the user should see the pitcher change on the lock screen activity display

Delayed -
game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status.

title: LA Lock Screen - game is RESUMED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a resumed state
custom_expected:
Resumed (Scheduled / Live / Final)
This is a game that was Suspended on a previous date.

We are treating resumed games as a new game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game starts
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the LA card view changes to live
AND it starts from the inning that they stopped

title: Enable/Disable all
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on notifications page
AND taps on favorite team
THEN ENABLE/DISABLE ALL button should be displayed
WHEN user taps on that button
THEN all toggles should enable/disable but the live activities

title: Mid inning state
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is between innings

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN hide count & base path details and display “Mid [Inning Number]”

title: Team At Bat Indicator
custom_steps:
GIVEN a live activity is not between inning (but rather in the middle of a live inning)

WHEN displaying the data on the platter

THEN add an indicator to the team that is at bat

title: Mid inning in play
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is in play

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN display [bot/top][inning]
AND bases, count, and outs
AND at bat indicator pointing to the team that is currently at bat
AND pitcher and player at bat

title: Live activities toggle
custom_preconds: User has a favorite team set in account settings
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on scores page

AND favorite team is about to play in the next 2 hours

WHEN user enables the track action item

AND refreshes the page

THEN the button should stay enabled

title: Team Order
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a game in preview
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team, logo, record displayed on the left
and the @ character
and the home team, logo, record displayed on the right

title: Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a Game Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: and no probables pitchers are set for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats displayed for both teams
and on iPad will display default MLB.com image
and on iPhone will display default player headshot

custom_steps_separated.content: and a probable pitcher is set for the away team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats for home team (right)
and the user will see the probable pitcher for the away team (left)

custom_steps_separated.content: and a probable pitcher is set for the home team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats for away team (left)
and the user will see the probable pitcher for the home team (right)

custom_steps_separated.content: and probable pitchers are set for both teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see probable pitcher for both teams 
and handness (LHP, RHP) and number will be displayed
and the current stats (W-L, ERA) and headshot will be displayed on iPhone
and current stats (W-L, ERA, K) and editorial report and action shot will be displayed on iPad

title: Lineups
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a Game Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: and no lineups are set for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a LINEUPS header
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' displayed once on iPhone
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' displayed under each team column

custom_steps_separated.content: and a lineup is set for the away team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see the lineup for the away team (left)
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' text for the home team (right)

custom_steps_separated.content: and a lineup is set for the home team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see the lineup for the home team (right)
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' text for the away team (left)

custom_steps_separated.content: and lineups are for both teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see LINEUPS header
and the text (Subject to Change) 
and the lineups for both teams 
and team logo will be displayed as a watermark and centered behind the team's lineup

custom_steps_separated.content:
and the user is viewing the lineup column
and the ballpark is an AL park (or a game with a DH)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Team Name
and a Player and Position header
and then 10 rows of data
and see Batting Order, Player Name, Batting Side (L or R or S), Position
and a dash for the starting pitching in the 10th row (name and position only)

custom_steps_separated.content:
and the user is viewing the lineup column
and the ballpark is an NL park (or a game without a DH)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Team Name
and a Player and Position header
and then 9 rows of data
and see Batting Order, Player Name, Batting Side (L or R or S), Position

title: Game Preview
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on an iPhone
and views a Game Preview
and the game has an editorial game preview published
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the editorial content in-between the game links and lineups
and the user will see preview image related to the game or probable pitcher
and a headline text under the bottom of the image
and a preview blurb with a More button
and tapping the image or blurb or More will open the Preview Article

title: Stadium Background - Day
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user taps on a day game in progress
custom_expected:
Then the stadium image that displays is the day image
and the stadium image that displays is the correct stadium image for that team

title: Stadium Background - Night
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user taps on a night game in progress
custom_expected:
Then the stadium image that displays is the night image
and the stadium image that displays is the correct stadium image for that team
